item.title: First contribution to an open-source project
item.description: First contribution to an open-source is the significant milestone in my journey as a software engineer, it’s a great way to learn and give back to the community. I’m currently working for Gridly, which is a content management and localization system. Gridly has a feature called Connector and it uses Airbyte internally for syncing data from other sources to Gridly. So I dicided to write Gridly as a source connector, to sync data from Gridly to other destinations.
